channel.title: Alerts state UNKNOWN in version 10
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
Hi, I’m having issues sending alerts on Redash 10, upgraded from 8 to use custom templates as it is necessary. No logs regarding for the alerts, and state is stuck in UNKNOWN. I have followed all public discussions and nothing came up (not using any parameter)
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 10.1.0.b50633 * How did you install Redash: docker-compose, upgraded with your guide from 8.0.0

item.title: Alerts state UNKNOWN in version 10
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Check your docker logs for the worker service. Do you see log messages of this format?

This should tell you whether or not alerts are event being checked.

worker_1     | [2022-06-07 14:36:56,068][PID:32][INFO][rq.job.redash.tasks.alerts] job.func_name=redash.tasks.alerts.check_alerts_for_query job.id=d0aeee7f-dff9-42f2-850e-26a7779c6324 Checking alert (1) of query 9.

Read full topic

item.title: Alerts state UNKNOWN in version 10
item.dc:creator: keterslater
item.description:
yes I have migrated everything successfully.
it happens with every query and even manually

Read full topic

item.title: Alerts state UNKNOWN in version 10
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Did you apply the necessary database migrations?

[edit] Does this affect very query that has a schedule? What happens if you execute a query manually?

Read full topic
